data.actual_result: Overlay will crash after a page or so... (Not the most consistent at happening) Seems to work better with Spotify Client closed as well
data.short_description: [Overlay] Excessively scrolling with a Spotify Embed somewhere on the page causes overlay to crash
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Overlay - Paste a Spotify Album or Song (that embeds) - Rapidly scroll up and down the page
